transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ha sollunga sollunga

Executive: Madam good evening madam Rajesh India Mart la irunthu pesurenga senior manager just unga kitta pesamudiyuma

Customer: Ha sollunga

Executive: Ok regarding unga concern than madam last time unga kitta discuss pannirunthom convince pannirunthom sales force la unga kitta rendu per pesirupanga madam so problem thirumbi again raise pannirukinga so online la porutha mattum step by step than ungalukku increase aagum madam so ippothan vanthirukom konja naal poga poga than namakku ok madam

Customer: Ok enakku na athu interest illa sir close pannunga enakku interest illa sir neenga proceed panna vendam sir

Executive: Illa madam namma interest oda irukku thana online la vanthirukinga neenga unga business growth kaga than namma invest panni ulla vanthirukom

Customer: Sollattuma illa enoda na na enakku enakku personally interest illa enoda catalog ku enakku leads antha alavu na expect pannura alavukku varuma enakku theriyala sir

Executive: Illa madam varuthe madam enna na step by step than varume ippothan namma ulla vanthirukom illingala three months aagattum pogumbothu namakku

Customer: Athukku apparamum enakku time waste panni money waste pannurathukku I am not ready so you can proceed with the cancel process sir

Executive: Madam oru business start pannurom appidina edutha muthal la antha business namma close panna mudiyathu illingala

Customer: Sari ok sir close pannunga

Executive: Payiroda palane

Customer: Close pannunga ok no issues

Executive: Business panna theriyalanu solla varalainga

Customer: Close pannunga

Executive: Illa madam business panna theriyalanu solla varalainga

Customer: Athu illa already na ithunala romba vanthu enakku hurt aayitten enakku ithula varavum illa enakku convince pannathinga ithukku apparam enakku pesurathukkum I am not ready and I am not ready to convince time waste also so

Executive: Madam ithu convince pannura maari neenga eduthukka vendam madam illa ithu convince pannura maari neenga eduthukka vendam madam ennanu na solren enna na namma online la ippothan puthusa ulla vanthirukom

Customer: Illa illa enakku leads athula varala sir na na innikku na temper aaga koodathunu na konjam silent aavum pesuren enakku mudiyala enakku venaanu sollitten neenga process pannunga enakku venaanu na sollitten thiruppi thiruppi neenga vanthuttu eduthukonga innum konjam wait pannunga innum konjam wait pannunga I am not interested nu sollitten la sir

Executive: Madam last time ithai than unga kitta pesirunthom neenga than yaaru sale eduthangalo avanga kitta pesirunthinga so enga service person enna solla varangangrathu munnadi ellame sollirunthinga so kamurmathu ithai than namma pannom illingala ippo again ithu pola start panna enna

Customer: Sari sir sari ippo naane solren sir sari pothumnu sollala ippo naane solren enakku venaam sir enakku venaam na thiruppi yen enakku athai force pannuringa venaam athula interest illanu na sollitten thiruppi yen force pannuringanu enakku puriyala

Executive: Illa madam madam appadi eduthukka vendam sorry madam force pannura maariyo ithu convince panna maariyo neenga eduthukka vendam madam ennanu na solren online la porutha varai enna na India Mart la neenga vanthirukinga illingala puthusa ulla varumbothu enna na ella kastomarukkum

Customer: Ok ok sir enoda catalog ku varala na try pannitten enakku varala ithukku apparam enakku athula ukaanthu enakku time waste pannanumnu enakku venaam sir na ungalukku India Mart eh waste appidinu na solla varala enoda catalog ku varala enakku vanthu athula time um illa ippo na vanthu search panni than lead edukkanum appidingrathu vanthu enakku venaam ingra na amount kuduthuttu na ukaanthu ella naalum ukaanthu search panni panni edukka mudiyathu na antha amount vera ethulayathu invest panniruntha kooda enakku direct contacts neraiya kidaikkum serious aave

Executive: Madam ithulayum ungalukku direct calls irukku direct enquiry irukke madam athula

Customer: Illa sir enakku varalanu solren sir neenga thiruppi thiruppi athe pesathinga enakku venaamnu sollitten thiruppi yen athe pesuringa enakku venaam I am not interested nu sollitten

Executive: Madam ippo namma online la vanthirukom madam edutha muthal la mudivu eduthukka vendam illingala enna na last month 17 enquiry direct aave vanthirukku mail mooliyama neenga choose panni eduthukka enquiry na solla varala

Customer: Athu vanthu kanakku kaatturathukkaaga kidayathu athula irunthu onnume enakku varala sir neenga neenga antha 17 enquiries vanthirukku appidina enquiries ku na contact pannu pesunale illa venaam naanga vanthu just checking kaaga pannom checking kaaga evlo naal na wait panna mudiyum sollunga enakku two months already na time waste ippo na innumum wait panni enakku amount athe athula amount porathu illama enakku muthala en time um pothu na vanthu antha amount vera ethulayathu na oru ithula invest panniruntha kooda ithukku mela na business eduthiruppen

Customer: Na onnum romba pesanum romba enakku business varanum appidilla na vanthu expect pannala enakku venaam na vitturunga sir enakku athula interest illa sir serious aa ithukku mela enakku pesurathukkum onnum illa

Executive: Madam correct thana sir neenga irukinga madam enna na B to B portal than athu neenga neenga ungaloda business um business manai depend panni than irukirathu correct thana sir neenga irukinga ithula than business man ellarume irukkaanga so athai meeri ethunala intha maari decision theriyala madam enna na namma maari neraiya customers um irukkaanga illingala

Executive: Hello

Customer: Sir neenga first enakku venaamnu sollitten sir neenga thiruppi thiruppi athe pesuringa enakku venaam sir

Customer: Refund process panna mudiyumna pannunga evlo naal la panna mudiyumnu mattum enakku sollunga enna charges na use pannurathukku athai deduct pannitte refund pannirunga

Executive: Sari madam and manager kitta ennanu na pesi solluren

Customer: Ok sir thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to cancel the subscription.

- Customer not getting enough leads.

- Customer feels like wasting time and money.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to convince customer to wait.

- Executive assured step by step growth.

- Executive agreed to process the refund.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss with manager about refund.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, leads, cancellation
